title: Virtual Therapy / Telehealth
shortDescription: Remote therapy sessions via secure video platforms for convenient home access.
description: Virtual therapy, or telehealth, delivers therapeutic services remotely through secure video conferencing platforms. For families of children with autism, telehealth can increase access to specialists, eliminate travel time, and allow therapy in the comfort of home. Many therapy types can be effectively delivered virtually, including speech therapy, parent coaching, behavioral consultation, and mental health services. Telehealth expanded dramatically during COVID-19 and remains a valuable option for many families.
benefits: Access to specialists regardless of location
Parents can easily observe and participate
whoCanBenefit: Families in rural or underserved areas
Children who do better in home environment
Those seeking specialist services not locally available
